entry.title: Germs Be Gone 60 ML Hand Sanitizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: FeelPureStore
Type: Sanitizer
Price: 119.99 - 1823.99 (4 variants)

Germs Be Gone Hand Sanitizer contains 65% ethyl alcohol and is enriched with Aloe & Vitamin E to kills germs on contact. Prevent catching or spreading colds and flu with Hand Sanitizer, ideal for travel and when you cannot wash your hands. Use regularly clean hands and kill 99.99% germs and bacteria instantly. Say no to sticky residue and hello to soft and smooth hands!

Apply a sufficient amount of the hand sanitizer to your hands, rub in well and allow your hands to dry. The quick-drying formula leaves your hands clean, fresh and germ-free. Children under 6 years of age should be supervised when using this product.

Health Canada Approved & Licenced Natural Product Number (NPN): 80021511

entry.title: BioRLX 99% Purity Aloe Vera Gel with Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid
entry.summary:
Vendor: FeelPureStore
Type: Retail
Price: 29.98 - 77.94 (2 variants)

This multi-functional soothing gel can be used on various body parts such as face, neck, arms, legs, and hair. BioRLX is proud to provide one of the best and highest quality Aloe Vera Gel on the market. This soothing gel is made from natural and pure ALOE VERA which rapidly absorbed by the skin for soothing and moisturizing effects and a refreshing sensation. This aloe vera gel gently hydrates your face, arms, legs, and hair. This magical formula will make your skin smooth and silky.

Aloe Vera moisturizes and calms irritation due to sun exposure; hydrates and softens skin Non-comedogenic Supplements skin's moisture balance Heals and soothes sun and element exposed skin Relieves dry, itchy skin Promotes soft and youthful-looking skin Moisturizers rejuvenate and protect the epidermis Irritated skin is calmed The skin is cooled and refreshed The skin is soothed and nourished

MULTIPURPOSE BEAUTY GEL FOR HEALTHY SKIN, HAIR & SCALP Aloe vera's calming & moisturizing properties have made it one of the world's best natural skin care ingredients. Using a special proprietary process, the BioRLX Aloe Vera Gel offers superior quality. BioRLX Aloe Vera Gel is made for everyday use to replenish your tired and dull skin with the nutrients you need and help you regain your youthful, glowing beauty. Our aloe vera gel unblocks your face's pores and helps to reduce acne recurrence.

Moisturizes dry and damaged skin.+ Provides a refreshing care after sun.+ Soothes irritated skin.+ Suitable for massage.+ Suitable for all skin types.+ Suitable for daily use.+ Free of Paraben, silicone and colourant.

entry.title: Nitrile Medical Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: FeelPureStore
Type: Gloves
Price: 124.95 - 2098.99 (20 variants)

Ideal for heavy duty jobs and for use by first responders, these gloves are thick and durable (11.0 mils thick at the palm, 14.2 mils thick at the fingers). Made of soft, elastic latex, they feel comfortable even after hours of wear. Their extended cuff offers keep wrists and forearms protected in the event of a splash when handling hazardous materials such as paints, solvents or cleansers. Textured fingers prevent slips when handling tools and materials.

These tough, blue gloves meet the emergency medical glove requirements set forth by the National Fire Protection Association (NFPA 1999). Designed with advanced materials formulations and proprietary technologies, these disposable gloves offer unique benefits like superior dexterity and grip, enhanced chemical resistance, and improved hand health.

Sizes range from small to XL. Sold in boxes of 100.

 

***Due to shortage of supply, we cannot guarantee the color or box of the gloves being shipped will be as illustrated. We can only guarantee that you will receive the right size and type of glove as per your order.

  • Powder Free
  • Latex Free
  • Textured Fingertips
  • Medical, Food & Home uses
  • Strong and tear resistant
  • Cool Blue Color
  • Ambidextrous
  • Enhanced Comfort
  • Sizes from small to extra large
  • Brand and colour may vary

Vendor: FeelPureStore
Type: Disinfectants & Alcohol

MG Chemicals Isopropyl Alcohol Electronics Cleaner. Safe on most plastics. 99.9 Percent pure anhydrous.

Meets Mil. spec. #TT-1-735A.
For use on: PC boards, connectors and contacts, semi-conductors, printed circuit boards, tape heads, light oils, office and medical equipment, relays, flux.

Purity: 99.9 percent by weight.
Refract. Index: 1.3766 (20 C.).
Water: 0.01 percent by weight.
Specific gravity: 0.7832 (25/25 C).
Nonvol: 0.0 mg/50mL.
Titratable acid: 0.13mL 02nNaOH.
Size: 945mL bottle.

RoHS Compliant.
